availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: County Judge in Carroll County, Kentucky. Walton, Kentucky, native. Son of Theodrick Fisher and Judith Tompkins. Married Mary Francis Root on January 28, 1855 in Carrollton, Kentucky. Attorney in Carroll County in 1850. Attorney in Carroll County in 1860.

bibl.p:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 341. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 268. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 5. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 445A. Find A Grave, "Judge William Martin Fisher (1827 - 1893)," Memorial #35441419, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=35441419&ref=acom (accessed November 16, 2016).
